item.description:
I just pre-registered for this as I think it may be a popular event. Please follow the instructions below to pre-register too!!

(Your thoughts on a quaint little spot nearby to grab a bite and perhaps a beverage after this are still welcome.)

4 - 6PM
Cost: Members of Trustees of Reservations: FREE. Nonmembers $5. Preregistration required.
Phone: 978.281.8400
IMPORTANT! Register here:Click to Register           


Join us for a candlelight stroll at twilight in Ravenswood Park. Together, we’ll celebrate the winter solstice in our favorite woodland park followed by a S’mores and hot chocolate around a warm fire. Pre-registration required.

group.name: Women Supporting Women Through Life's Incredible Journeys

item.name: Solstice Stroll at Ravenswood Park Gloucester
